Package ludo.square

Interface ISquare

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    CouloirSquare, CrossingSquare, EndSquare, HomeSquare, InvalidSquare, NormalSquare

    public interface ISquare
    Interface for all the square classes. The squares are the fields on the ludo board where tokens can be set and moved around. It is implemented by the following specific squares:
    See Also:
    NormalSquare, CouloirSquare, CrossingSquare, HomeSquare, EndSquare

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void enter​(Token enterToken)
      Makes a token enter this square.
      ISquare getNextSquare​(Token token)
      Returns the square following this one on the board
      Token getToken​()
      Returns the Token on this square.
      boolean isOccupied​()
      Returns true, if there is a token on this square.
      void leave​(Token token)
      Makes the token leave this field.
      void setCouloirEnter​(CouloirSquare square)
      Used to connect outer route to the inner couloirs.
      void setNextSquare​(ISquare nextSquare)
      Setter to define the square following this one on the board.

    • Method Detail

      • isOccupied

        boolean isOccupied​()
        Returns true, if there is a token on this square.
        Returns:
        true, if this square is occupied false else

      • enter

        void enter​(Token enterToken)
        Makes a token enter this square.
        Parameters:
        enterToken -

      • getNextSquare

        ISquare getNextSquare​(Token token)
        Returns the square following this one on the board
        Parameters:
        token - The Token that asks the next square. Used to determine its way at the crossing square.
        Returns:
        the square that follows on the board

      • setNextSquare

        void setNextSquare​(ISquare nextSquare)
        Setter to define the square following this one on the board. Used by the board to initialize it.
        Parameters:
        nextSquare - The square to be difined as the follower of this one.

      • leave

        void leave​(Token token)
        Makes the token leave this field. Sets the parameter "Token" to null.
        Parameters:
        token - The token that finds himself on this field and is expected to leave.

      • setCouloirEnter

        void setCouloirEnter​(CouloirSquare square)
        Used to connect outer route to the inner couloirs. Only used by CrossingSquare.
        Parameters:
        square - The first square of th erespective couloir

      • getToken

        Token getToken​()
        Returns the Token on this square. Null, if there is no one.
